photoeffects: Vivid, Neutral, Low Sharpening, Sepia, Black & White
batteries: 2x Size-AA Alkaline or NiMH Batteries (Alkalines supplied)
continuousshooting: Approx. 2.2 fps¹ (speed maintained for up to 12 images)²
batterylife: Alkaline batteries: Approx. 75 shots (LCD monitor on) Approx. 250 shots (LCD monitor off) NiMH (NB-2AH) batteries: Approx. 350 shots (LCD monitor on) Approx. 950 shots (LCD monitor off) Approx. 90 min. (Playback)
menucategories: (1) Recording Menu (2) Playback menu (3) Set-up menu (4) My camera menu (5) Function menu
aflock: Locked when shutter button is pressed half way
displayformats: Single/ Index (9 thumbnail images)/ Slide Show/ Magnified/ Movie
stillimagetype: JPEG (Exif 2.2 [Exif Print] compliant) / Design rule for Camera File system, Digital Print Order Format [DPOF] Version 1.1 compliant
menulanguages: English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
